channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-7808] Refactor Store to use HRegionFileSystem
item.description:
Move HStore fs related code inside the HRegionFileSystem.
File creation and retrival should be handled there, and the use will be something like.


HRegionFileSystem fs = new HRegionFileSystem

file = fs.createFile()

fs.commitFile(family, file);

for (storeFile: fs.getStoreFiles(family))

   ...

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: left minor feedback on JIRA. Generally looks good. Do you want to click submit so the tests would run?

TestSplitTransactionOnCluster is flaky HBASE-7686, HBASE-7981 and not related, tried to debug it a bit and made a patch to fix some stuff, but it's still flaky.
TestZooKeeper is a timeout, and unrelated to this change.

v5 is the same as v4 + rebase.
Running another test before committing if not other feedback.
